title: The Way of the dragon = Return of the dragon
creator_credit: Bruce Lee, Raymond Chow and Golden Harvest
brief_description: Tang Lung travels to Rome to help save a family friend’s restaurant which is being threatened by a powerful gang boss. Initially seen as an embarrassment amongst his Chinese friends, Tang Lung is soon held in high esteem when he reveals his masterful martial arts skills defending the restaurant against the thugs. The gang boss begins a number of attacks on the restaurant in an effort to defeat Tang Lung. He finally flies in an American martial arts assassin to challenge Tang Lung to fight to the death. Cast includes: Bruce Lee, Nora Miao and Chuck Norris. Dubbed into English.
